label: Hausdorf, Bernhard.  2013. Correcting the nomenclature of two Helix dejecta: Helicopsis arenosa (Krynicki, 1836) (Gastropoda: Hygromiidae) from Eastern Europe and Streptartemon dejectus (Moricand, 1836) (Gastropoda: Streptaxidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3637(4): 498–500.
value: Hausdorf, Bernhard.  2013. Correcting the nomenclature of two Helix dejecta: Helicopsis arenosa (Krynicki, 1836) (Gastropoda: Hygromiidae) from Eastern Europe and Streptartemon dejectus (Moricand, 1836) (Gastropoda: Streptaxidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3637(4): 498–500.
